an4.66:4.1: “Mendicants, these four people are found in the world.
an4.66:4.3: The greedy, the hateful, the delusional, and the conceited.
an4.66:4.4: These are the four people found in the world.”
an4.66:6.1: Born of greed, born of hate,
an4.66:7.1: If you act out these qualities, that’s what you become.
an4.66:7.3: are blind, with no eyes to see,
an4.66:7.4: and they never imagine that this could be so.”
